items.content_html: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.

items.content_html: Taskify is a lightweight, user-friendly task manager app that helps you manage and organize your tasks with ease. It features task input, task deletion, search functionality, and task completion toggling. All tasks are persisted in the local storage, so they remain saved even after refreshing the page.
items.title: King4584/Taskify: Taskify is a lightweight, user-friendly task manager app that helps you manage and organize your tasks with ease. It features task input, task deletion, search functionality, and task completion toggling. All tasks are persisted in the local storage, so they remain saved even after refreshing the page.

items.content_html: A lightweight web wallet for Cardano cryptocurrency with Trezor, Ledger and BitBox02 support. Please note that the only valid domain for our wallet is adalite.io

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: A lightweight, multi-tier online bookstore with Node.js RESTful microservices for catalog and order handling, supported by a MySQL database. Features search by topic, book info retrieval, and purchasing capabilities, with distributed deployment and concurrent request management across separate services.
items.title: masaabuaisheh/A-Multi-tier-Online-Book-Store: A lightweight, multi-tier online bookstore with Node.js RESTful microservices for catalog and order handling, supported by a MySQL database. Features search by topic, book info retrieval, and purchasing capabilities, with distributed deployment and concurrent request management across separate services.

items.content_html: Elmio is a lightweight, proof-of-concept web framework inspired by The Elm Architecture. It's built using the Rust programming language and compiles to WebAssembly.
items.title: xosnrdev/elmio: Elmio is a lightweight, proof-of-concept web framework inspired by The Elm Architecture. It's built using the Rust programming language and compiles to WebAssembly.
